span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 抑制，限制： the act or practice of keeping something (as an activity) within certain boundaries
【例】 keep a much tighter rein on the activities of contractors.
【近】 circumscription, confinement, limitation, stint
【考法 2】 vi. 抑制，控制： to keep from exceeding a desirable degree or level (as of expression)
【例】 rein in one's temper.
【近】 bridle, check, constrain, contain, curb, govern, hold, inhibit, keep, measure, regulate, restrain, rule, tame
【反】 liberate,loose, loosen,unleash 释放，不再加以管束
【记】 reign 统治就是拿着缰绳来控制；ring 圈，绳圈，驾马车的手里拿的缰绳是个圈
【另】 restrain 抑制, 制止，sovereign 君主, 统治
